title: Place a Laboratory Order
description: A physician needs to order a Complete Blood Count (CBC) and a Basic Metabolic Panel (BMP) for a patient.

tasks.description: Open the patient's chart and navigate to the 'Orders' section.
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician accesses the order entry module.

tasks.description: Search for and select the 'CBC' and 'BMP' lab tests.
tasks.expected_outcome: Physician adds both tests to the order basket.

tasks.description: Sign the orders, which transmits them to the Laboratory Information System (LIS).
tasks.expected_outcome: The orders are successfully placed and are now pending collection in the lab system.
